attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FreeLifeEarth could run this Country for a minimum of 50% less than current.
We don't need politics/politicians or bureaucratic quangos.
check out freelifeearth.com and join us now. Regain your own life and freedom of choice.
